ﬁeld. Recently, deep learning methods such as recurrent neural networks and one-dimensional
convolutional neural networks, or CNNs, have been shown to provide state-of-the-art results on
challenging activity recognition tasks with little or no data feature engineering.
In this tutorial, you will discover the Activity Recognition Using Smartphones dataset for
time series classiﬁcation and how to load and explore the dataset in order to make it ready for
